results.name: Differences between the numbers n such that 4n^2 + 1 is prime.
comment: Sequence A001912 has the values of n. This sequence is the first differences of A001912.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
xref: Cf. A121326 (primes of the form 1+4*n^2), A001912 (values of n).
results.author: _T. D. Noe_, Aug 06 2012
